attributes.action: Reconsider the planned rise in Road Tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As millions of motorists have to use their cars to get from their homes to work, I think it is unfair to expect them to fork out more than they should do to run their cars. What with fuel prices being high at the moment.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
